added.name: AOTPriorityInline
added.description: Enable use of priority inlining during AOT compilation.

added.name: AllowedNumberOfInaccurateProfiles
added.description: Threshold for number of points with inaccurate profiles.

added.name: AlwaysPreTouch
added.description: Force all freshly committed pages to be pre-touched.

added.name: AuxiliaryEngineCache
added.description: Enable the auxiliary engine cache features at runtime.

added.name: BaseTargetSpending
added.description: The base target spending used to estimate the inlining threshold; the higher, the likelier it is to inline.

added.name: BlockZeroingLowLimit
added.description: Minimum amount of bytes when block zeroing used. (SPARC only).

added.name: BreakChainedPhis
added.description: Break chained phis.

added.name: CallGraphCompilerNodeLimit
added.description: Controls the maximum number of compiler nodes that can appear in the call graph.

added.name: CallGraphSizeLimit
added.description: Controls the maximum size of the call graph before ceasing inlining.

added.name: CallGraphSizePenaltyCoefficient
added.description: Reduces the likelihood of exploring call graph subtrees that are large.

added.name: CompileInPerThreadReusedIsolates
added.description:
Create one reusable isolate per compilation thread as opposed to one isolate per compilation (enable through 
CompileInIsolates).

added.name: CompilerNodePenaltyCoefficient
added.description: Controls the likelihood of exploring subtrees that already have a lot of code during inlining.

added.name: ConcGCThreads
added.description: Number of threads concurrent gc will use.

added.name: ConsiderVectorizableLoops
added.description:
Consider the vectorizability of loop during the duplication of a merge inside a loop.There are rare cases where 
duplication can destroy vectorization.

added.name: CostNewLiveVariable
added.description:
PullThroughPhiOptimization: Abstract cost for the creation of a new live value: new values can have a negativeimpact on 
register allocation, therefore we penalize it.

added.name: CostReductionFactor
added.description:
PullThroughPhiOptimization: Cost/Benefit heuristic for EE floating node duplication: reduce cost by a constant factor 
when comparing with relative benefit.

added.name: CutoffCodeSizePenaltyCoefficient
added.description: Controls the likelihood of further exploring subtrees with a lot of code during inlining.

added.name: Debug
added.description: Control debug information output: 0 - no debuginfo, 1 - AOT code debuginfo, 2 - AOT and runtime code debuginfo.

added.name: DebugLoopInversion
added.description: Debug the loop inversion transformation.

added.name: DebugPeelingSynonyms
added.description: Debug simulation synonyms during simulation-based loop peeling.

added.name: DuplicateALot
added.description: Perform Duplications as long as there is any sane improvement.

added.name: DuplicationBudgetFactor
added.description: Percentage in node cost graph size for the duplication budget. Computed relative to the methods code size.

added.name: DuplicationBudgetFactorLate
added.description: Percentage in node cost graph size for the late duplication budget. Computed relative to the methods code size.

added.name: DuplicationCostReductionFactor
added.description:
Cost/Benefit heuristic for EE simulation-based code duplication: reduce cost by a constant factor when comparing with 
relative benefit.

added.name: DuplicationMinBranchFrequency
added.description: Ignore low frequency branches during duplication.

added.name: EnablePGOContextSensitivity
added.description: Enables context sensitivity in PGO.

added.name: EnterpriseCloneReadElimination
added.description: Try to eliminate array clone operations by handling clone operations in early read elimination.

added.name: EnterpriseEarlyReadElimination
added.description: Run more read eliminations early in the compilation pipeline.

added.name: EnterprisePartialUnroll
added.description: Enable EE version of partial loop unrolling that considers more loop shapes for unrolling.

added.name: ErgoHeapSizeLimit
added.description: Maximum ergonomically set heap size (in bytes); zero means use MaxRAM * MaxRAMPercentage / 100.

added.name: ExcludeFunctionFromDuplication
added.description: Exclude compilations that MethodFilter.match this string from the duplication optimization.

added.name: ExpandAllProximityBonus
added.description: The decrease in call graph expansion pressure when there are few call nodes left to explore.

added.name: ExpandAllProximityBonusInertia
added.description: The inertia at which the expand-all proximity bonus decreases with the number of yet unexpanded nodes.

added.name: ExpansionInertiaBaseValue
added.description: The slowness at which the expansion pressure grows with code size; the higher it is, the slower the pressure growth.

added.name: ExpansionInertiaInvokeBonus
added.description: The extra slowness at which the expansion pressure grows with the code size, for each extra invoke node.

added.name: ExpansionInertiaMax
added.description: The max slowness at which the expansion pressure grows with the code size.

added.name: ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrent
added.description: A System.gc() request invokes a concurrent collection.

added.name: ExtendedLinuxHeaders
added.description: Enable support for linux-specific headers.

added.name: FlightRecorder
added.description: Enable Java Flight Recorder.

added.name: ForceUnroll
added.description: Force partial unrolling of loops if at all possible.

added.name: FullUnrollAsPEACleanup
added.description: Perform full unrolling as a Partial Escape Analysis Cleanup.

added.name: G1ConcMarkStepDurationMillis
added.description: Target duration of individual concurrent marking steps in milliseconds.

added.name: G1ConcRSHotCardLimit
added.description: The threshold that defines (>=) a hot card.

added.name: G1ConcRSLogCacheSize
added.description: Log base 2 of the length of conc RS hot-card cache.

added.name: G1ConcRefinementGreenZone
added.description:
The number of update buffers that are left in the queue by the concurrent processing threads. Will be selected 
ergonomically by default.

added.name: G1ConcRefinementRedZone
added.description:
Maximum number of enqueued update buffers before mutator threads start processing new ones instead of enqueueing them. 
Will be selected ergonomically by default.

added.name: G1ConcRefinementServiceIntervalMillis
added.description: The last concurrent refinement thread wakes up every specified number of milliseconds to do miscellaneous work.

added.name: G1ConcRefinementThreads
added.description: The number of parallel rem set update threads. Will be set ergonomically by default.

added.name: G1ConcRefinementThresholdStep
added.description:
Each time the rset update queue increases by this amount activate the next refinement thread if available. The actual 
step size will be selected ergonomically by default, with this value used to determine a lower bound.

added.name: G1ConcRefinementYellowZone
added.description: Number of enqueued update buffers that will trigger concurrent processing. Will be selected ergonomically by default.

added.name: G1ConfidencePercent
added.description: Confidence level for MMU/pause predictions.

added.name: G1DebugLevel
added.description: Specifies the debug level of the linked G1 GC [product, fastdebug, or debug].

added.name: G1HeapRegionSize
added.description: Size of the G1 regions in bytes. Supported values are 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, or 32M.

added.name: G1HeapWastePercent
added.description: Amount of space, expressed as a percentage of the heap size, that G1 is willing not to collect to avoid expensive GCs.

added.name: G1MixedGCCountTarget
added.description: The target number of mixed GCs after a marking cycle.

added.name: G1PeriodicGCInterval
added.description:
Number of milliseconds after a previous GC to wait before triggering a periodic gc. A value of zero disables 
periodically enforced gc cycles.

added.name: G1PeriodicGCInvokesConcurrent
added.description:
Determines the kind of periodic GC. Set to true to have G1 perform a concurrent GC as periodic GC, otherwise use a STW 
Full GC.

added.name: G1PeriodicGCSystemLoadThreshold
added.description:
Maximum recent system wide load as returned by the 1m value of getloadavg() at which G1 triggers a periodic GC. A load 
above this value cancels a given periodic GC. A value of zero disables this check.

added.name: G1RSetRegionEntries
added.description: Max number of regions for which we keep bitmaps. Will be set ergonomically by default.

added.name: G1RSetSparseRegionEntries
added.description: Max number of entries per region in a sparse table. Will be set ergonomically by default.

added.name: G1RSetUpdatingPauseTimePercent
added.description: A target percentage of time that is allowed to be spend on process RS update buffers during the collection pause.

added.name: G1RefProcDrainInterval
added.description: The number of discovered reference objects to process before draining concurrent marking work queues.

added.name: G1ReservePercent
added.description: It determines the minimum reserve we should have in the heap to minimize the probability of promotion failure.

added.name: G1SATBBufferEnqueueingThresholdPercent
added.description:
Before enqueueing them, each mutator thread tries to do some filtering on the SATB buffers it generates. If 
post-filtering the percentage of retained entries is over this threshold the buffer will be enqueued for processing. A
value of 0 specifies that mutator threads should not do such filtering.

added.name: G1SATBBufferSize
added.description: Number of entries in an SATB log buffer.

added.name: G1UpdateBufferSize
added.description: Size of an update buffer.

added.name: G1UseAdaptiveConcRefinement
added.description: Select green, yellow and red zones adaptively to meet the the pause requirements.

added.name: G1UseAdaptiveIHOP
added.description:
Adaptively adjust the initiating heap occupancy from the initial value of InitiatingHeapOccupancyPercent. The policy 
attempts to start marking in time based on application behavior.

added.name: G1VerifyBitmaps
added.description: Verifies the consistency of the marking bitmaps.

added.name: G1VerifyHeapRegionCodeRoots
added.description: Verify the code root lists attached to each heap region.

added.name: G1VerifyRSetsDuringFullGC
added.description: If true, perform verification of each heap region's remembered set when verifying the heap during a full GC.

added.name: GCDrainStackTargetSize
added.description: Number of entries we will try to leave on the stack during parallel gc.

added.name: GCPauseIntervalMillis
added.description: Time slice for MMU specification.

added.name: GCTimeRatio
added.description: Adaptive size policy application time to GC time ratio.

added.name: GenerateRuntimeDebugInfo
added.description: Generate debuginfo for runtime-compiled code.

added.name: HeapSizePerGCThread
added.description: Size of heap (bytes) per GC thread used in calculating the number of GC threads.

added.name: HighTierPartialUnrolling
added.description: Enable EE partial unrolling in high tier.

added.name: IgnoreBadDuplications
added.description: Ignore duplications with a bad benefit cost relation.

added.name: InitialHeapSize
added.description: Initial heap size (in bytes); zero means use ergonomics.

added.name: InitialRAMPercentage
added.description: Percentage of real memory used for initial heap size.

added.name: InitiatingHeapOccupancyPercent
added.description:
The percent occupancy (IHOP) of the current old generation capacity above which a concurrent mark cycle will be 
initiated. Its value may change over time if adaptive IHOP is enabled, otherwise the value remains constant. In the
latter case a value of 0 will result as frequent as possible concurrent marking cycles. A value of 100 disables
concurrent marking. Fragmentation waste in the old generation is not considered free space in this calculation.

added.name: InlineAllBonus
added.description: The bonus applied to call nodes that can be fully inlined.

added.name: InlineAllExplored
added.description: Inline everything previously explored.

added.name: InlinedCompilerNodeLimit
added.description: Controls the maximum number of compiler nodes that can be inlined into the compiled method.

added.name: InliningCoefficient
added.description: The coefficient used to compute the inlining threshold; the higher, the more to inline.

added.name: InsertPreMainPostOnly
added.description: Do not unroll the main loop, only create pre-main-post.

added.name: InspectGraphs
added.description: Inspect analysis graphs.

added.name: LargeChildrenCountPenaltyCoefficient
added.description: Reduces the likelihood of exploring call graphs that have a lot of children below the root.

added.name: LoopInversion
added.description: Convert loops into their zero trip form.

added.name: MarkStackSize
added.description: Size of marking stack.

added.name: MarkStackSizeMax
added.description: Maximum size of marking stack.

added.name: MaxCpuLocalsPerCounter
added.description: Upper bound on the number of cpu locals per counter. It has to be a power of 2.

added.name: MaxGCPauseMillis
added.description: Adaptive size policy maximum GC pause time goal in millisecond, or the maximum GC time per MMU time slice.

added.name: MaxGraphSizeNodeCost
added.description: Maximum node cost graph size for duplication. If a graph is bigger duplication will stop.

added.name: MaxMispredictionCostIncreaseFactor
added.description: Abstract measure of the cost of branch misprediction. Higher values make generation of conditional moves more likely.

added.name: MaxPolymorphicDispatches
added.description: The maximum number of dispatches in guarded polymorphic inlining.

added.name: MaxPriorityInliningPeelingIterations
added.description: Max number of precise inlining peeling iterations.

added.name: MaxRAM
added.description: Real memory size (in bytes) used to set maximum heap size.

added.name: MaxRAMPercentage
added.description: Maximum percentage of real memory used for maximum heap size.

added.name: MaxSimulationIterations
added.description: Maximum simulation-duplication iterations of the duplication optimization per invocation.

added.name: MaxTenuringThreshold
added.description: Maximum value for tenuring threshold.

added.name: MaxThinLockRecursion
added.description: Maximum recursive locking depth for thin locks.

added.name: MaxVectorAlignmentUnroll
added.description: Maximum number of unrolled alignment instructions.

added.name: MaxVectorUnroll
added.description: Maximum length of linear-code vector operations.

added.name: MaximumTransitiveEnabledPullFactor
added.description: PullThroughPhiOptimization: Maximum number of algorithm iterations per optimization invocation.

added.name: MidTierPartialUnrolling
added.description: Enable EE partial unrolling in mid tier.

added.name: MinBlockFrequencyPull
added.description: PullThroughPhiOptimization: Ignore low frequency branches during duplication.

added.name: MinHeapDeltaBytes
added.description: The minimum change in heap space due to GC (in bytes).

added.name: MinHeapFreeRatio
added.description: The minimum percentage of heap free after GC to avoid expansion.

added.name: MinPolymorphicDispatchProbability
added.description: The minimum probability for using a dispatch in guarded polymorphic inlining.

added.name: MinRAMPercentage
added.description: Minimum percentage of real memory used for maximum heap size on systems with small physical memory size.

added.name: MinTLABSize
added.description: Minimum allowed TLAB size (in bytes).

added.name: MinimalRegions
added.description: Try to reduce duplication code size to the minimal amount of code.

added.name: MultiExitCostFactor
added.description:
Cost/Benefit heuristic for EE unrolling: If a loop has multiple exits, cost is increased by this value for every 
none-sinking loop exit.

added.name: MultiExitCostFactorSink
added.description:
Cost/Benefit heuristic for EE unrolling: If a loop has multiple exits, cost is increased by this value for every sinking 
loop exit.

added.name: NewRatio
added.description: Ratio of old/new generation sizes.

added.name: NewSize
added.description: Initial new generation size (in bytes).

added.name: OldPLABSize
added.description: Size of old gen promotion LAB's (in HeapWords).

added.name: OldSize
added.description: Initial tenured generation size (in bytes).

added.name: OptBulkAllocation
OptCompressedFrameStateValues
OptConditionalMoves
added.description: Optimize simple if branches with conditional moves.

added.name: OptDeDuplication
OptDuplication
OptExactArithmetic
OptGuardRangeGrouping
OptInlineImageHeapConstants
added.description: Optimize address operations that involve image heap constants.

added.name: OptLateDuplication
OptLockElimination
OptLoopPhiStamps
added.description: Inject stamps on induction variables.

added.name: OptPullThroughPhi
OptStringConcat
added.description: Optimize StringBuilder construction.

added.name: OptStringConcatDump
added.description: Dump graphs to help debug operation.

added.name: OptWriteBarrierElimination
added.description: Eliminate redundant write barriers.

added.name: OptimisticAliasingAnalysis
OptimizeLoopAccesses
added.description: Enable access node optimizations for loops.

added.name: PGOInstrument
added.description: Dump information for Profile Guided Optimizations (true or file name).

added.name: PGOPathProfile
added.description: Replace PGO profiling counters with path-profiling counters.

added.name: PGOPathProfileVerify
added.description: Collect PGO counters, and verify that they match the path-profile counters.

added.name: PLABWeight
added.description: Percentage (0-100) used to weight the current sample when computing exponentially decaying average for ResizePLAB.

added.name: ParGCArrayScanChunk
added.description: Scan a subset of object array and push remainder, if array is bigger than this.

added.name: ParallelGCBufferWastePct
added.description: Wasted fraction of parallel allocation buffer.

added.name: ParallelGCThreads
added.description: Number of parallel threads parallel gc will use.

added.name: ParallelRefProcBalancingEnabled
added.description: Enable balancing of reference processing queues.

added.name: ParallelRefProcEnabled
added.description: Enable parallel reference processing whenever possible.

added.name: PartialRedundancyElimination
added.description: Enable partial redundancy elimination.

added.name: PartialUnrollCostReductionFactorHighTier
added.description:
Cost/Benefit heuristic for EE unrolling in high tier: reduce cost by a constant factor when comparing with relative
benefit.

added.name: PartialUnrollCostReductionFactorMidTier
added.description:
Cost/Benefit heuristic for EE unrolling in mid tier: reduce cost by a constant factor when comparing with relative 
benefit.

added.name: PartialUnrollMaxIterationsHighTier
added.description: Maximum number of iterations to unroll for a high tier main loop.

added.name: PartialUnrollMaxIterationsMidTier
added.description: Maximum number of iterations to unroll for a mid tier main loop.

added.name: PartialUnrollMaxSizeHighTier
added.description: Maximum node cost size of a loop to be considered for high tier unrolling.

added.name: PartialUnrollMaxSizeMidTier
added.description: Maximum node cost size of a loop to be considered for mid tier tier unrolling.

added.name: PartialUnrollMinFrequency
added.description: Minimal loop frequency to consider a loop for partial unrolling.

added.name: PathProfileCutThreshold
added.description:
The limit on the number of paths at control-flow merges. Decreasing this value reduces the number of paths, but also 
shortens them.

added.name: PathProfileDumpFile
added.description: Dump information for path profile (null or file name). If set to null, then dumping is disabled.

added.name: PathProfileFrequentThreshold
added.description: Maximum acceptable number of paths coming from the inbound of a merge if both of them are frequent.

added.name: PathProfileGlobalLowFrequencyRatio
added.description:
If some block's relative frequency drops below this number times the maximum relative frequency in the graph, then the 
block is considered infrequent.

added.name: PathProfileLocalLowFrequencyRatio
added.description:
If the ratio of the merge's frequency with its inbound's frequency is greater than this threshold, then the inbound is 
considered infrequent.

added.name: PathProfileMaxTotalCounters
added.description: Maximum number of counters to use in path profiling for all instrumented methods.

added.name: PathProfilePolicy
added.description: Enable or disable the path-profiling algorithm. If it enables it, it also allows to select which mode to execute.

added.name: PathProfileRegenerate
added.description: Controls whether the path-regeneration algorithm is executed.

added.name: PeelingConsideredMinFrequency
added.description: Minimal loop frequency necessary to consider peeling.

added.name: PenalizeComplexLoopControlFlow
added.description:
Increase the cost of duplicating control flow splits inside loops if they are not foldable.The generally tend to 
complicate control flow and generate worse code in the backend.

added.name: PerfDataMemorySize
added.description: Size of performance data memory region. Will be rounded up to a multiple of the native os page size.

added.name: PerfDataSamplingInterval
added.description: Jvmstat instrumentation sampling interval (in milliseconds).

added.name: PerfMaxStringConstLength
added.description: Maximum PerfStringConstant string length before truncation.

added.name: PreTouchParallelChunkSize
added.description: Per-thread chunk size for parallel memory pre-touch.

added.name: PrefetchCopyIntervalInBytes
added.description: How far ahead to prefetch destination area (<= 0 means off).

added.name: PrefetchScanIntervalInBytes
added.description: How far ahead to prefetch scan area (<= 0 means off).

added.name: PrintPGOStatistics
added.description: Print hit, miss and partial match counts after comparision with collected profiles. It is used for testing.

added.name: PriorityInliningPolicy
added.description: The policy to use, must be empty for automatic resolution.

added.name: PriorityInliningTuningPolicy
added.description:
Comma-separated list of analysis policies for exploring the methods in the call graph and for inlining, empty for no
policy.

added.name: ProfileDumpPeriod
added.description:
Integer greater than zero representing the duration in seconds that will be used to trigger a profile capture. Any 
integer less than one disables periodic dumps.

added.name: ProfileLockElimination
ProfileOptBulkAllocation
ProfileSelfTime
added.description: Excludes time spent in invoked methods; measures total time including subcalls when turned off.

added.name: ProfilesCollect
added.description: Instrument AOT compiled code to collect data for profile-guided optimization into default.iprof file.

added.name: ProfilesDumpFile
added.description: Value should point to a profile dump file.

added.name: ProfilesUse
added.description:
A comma-separated list of files from which to read the data collected for profile-guided optimization of AOT compiled 
code (reads from default.iprof if nothing is specified).

added.name: ProfilingPointRequiredHitCount
added.description: Lower bound for point hit count when compared to collected profiles. It is used for testing.

added.name: ProtectionKeys
added.description: Enable support for Memory Protection Keys.

added.name: PruneLargeDominatorUsageTrees
PullThroughPhiCodeSizeIncrease
added.description:
PullThroughPhiOptimization: Percentage in node cost graph size for the floating node duplication budget. Computed 
relative to the method's graph size.

added.name: QueuedAllocationWarningCount
added.description: Number of times an allocation that queues behind a GC will retry before printing a warning.

added.name: RefDiscoveryPolicy
added.description: Select type of reference discovery policy: reference-based(0) or referent-based(1).

added.name: RelativeBenefitInliningCoefficient
added.description: The coefficient used to compute the inlining threshold; the higher, the hard to inline.

added.name: ReservedAuxiliaryImageBytes
added.description: Size in bytes of an address space to reserve for auxiliary images.

added.name: ResizePLAB
added.description: Dynamically resize (survivor space) promotion LAB's.

added.name: ResizeTLAB
added.description: Dynamically resize TLAB size for threads.

added.name: RespectVectorization
added.description: Try avoid unrolling vectorizable loops.

added.name: RuntimeDebugInfo
added.description: Provide debuginfo for runtime-compiled code.

added.name: RuntimeSourceDestDir
added.description: Directory where Java source-files will be placed for the debugger.

added.name: ScheduledDuplicationSimulation
added.description: Simulation can either only process fixed nodes or schedule the graph and also process floating nodes.

added.name: SimulationBasedLoopPeeling
added.description: Use DBDS algorithm to simulate the impact of peeling on a loop.

added.name: SimulationPruneUnlikelyBranches
added.description: Ignore low frequency branches during simulation.

added.name: SmallRootIrPenaltyCoefficient
added.description: Reduces the likelihood of exploring call graphs with IR size much larger than the root.

added.name: SourceLevelDebug
added.description:
Preserve the local variable information for every Java source line to allow line-by-line stepping in the debugger. Allow 
the lookup of Java-level method information, e.g., in stack traces.

added.name: SourceLevelDebugFilter
added.description: Constrain debug info generation to the comma-separated list of package prefixes given to this option.

added.name: SourceSearchPath
added.description:
List of used-defined paths (separated by the system's path-separator character) in addition to automatic 
SourceSearchPath detection.

added.name: SpeculativeStoreCheck
added.description: Speculates that arrays have exact type to optimize store checks.

added.name: StartFlightRecording
added.description: Start flight recording with options.

added.name: StripDebugInfo
added.description: Strip debug info from the image.

added.name: SurvivorRatio
added.description: Ratio of eden/survivor space size.

added.name: TLABAllocationWeight
added.description: Allocation averaging weight.

added.name: TLABRefillWasteFraction
added.description: Maximum TLAB waste at a refill (internal fragmentation).

added.name: TLABSize
added.description: Starting TLAB size (in bytes); zero means set ergonomically.

added.name: TLABWasteIncrement
added.description: Increment allowed waste at slow allocation.

added.name: TLABWasteTargetPercent
added.description: Percentage of Eden that can be wasted.

added.name: TargetPLABWastePct
added.description: Target wasted space in last buffer as percent of overall allocation.

added.name: TargetSurvivorRatio
added.description: Desired percentage of survivor space used after scavenge.

added.name: TimeStampProfiling
added.description: Profile method execution time.

added.name: TraceAuxiliaryImageClassHistogram
added.description: Enables detailed tracing of auxiliary image events.

added.name: TraceAuxiliaryImageReferenceTree
added.description: Enables detailed tracing of auxiliary image events.

added.name: TrackGraphSizesInDuplication
added.description: Enable (if Count is enabled) graph size tracking during every duplication iteration.

added.name: TrackInliningStatistics
added.description:
Track inlining statistics (inlining duration, call tree size, compiler node counts, and the number of callsites). One 
of: none, interactive.

added.name: TrivialLoopSizeLimitForPeeling
added.description:
Loop peeling will consider any loop with a size (in terms of estimated machine instructions) below this value to be a 
prime candidate for peeling. Larger loops will only be considered for peeling if the simulated benefit of peeling is
relatively high. The larger the loop, the greater the expected benefit has to be.

added.name: TryExplodeOverPhis
added.description: PullThroughPhiOptimization: Enable floating node duplication over multiple phi nodes at once.

added.name: TryPhiPhiPulls
added.description:
PullThroughPhiOptimization: Enable floating node duplication over phis where the target node has different phis as 
input.

added.name: TuneInlinerExploration
added.description:
Increases or decreases the time spent exploring inlining opportunities under the assumption that more time results in 
better peak performance and less time reduces time to reach (a lower) peak performance. The value of the option is
clamped between -1 and 1 inclusive. Anything below 0, reduces the exploration time and anything above 0 increases
exploration time. Note that this option is only a heuristic and should be tuned for any specific application.

added.name: TypeFlowPrinterInRadius
added.description: How many levels of inputs to print. A value of 0 prints only the target flow.

added.name: TypeFlowPrinterOutRadius
added.description: How many levels of outputs to print. A value of 0 prints only the target flow.

added.name: TypicalCallGraphSize
added.description: Denotes the call graph size that is considered medium size.

added.name: TypicalGraphSize
added.description: The typical graph size at which inlining pressure must start growing.

added.name: TypicalGraphSizeInvokeBonus
added.description: The increase in estimated typical graph size after inlining, per each extra invoke.

added.name: TypicalGraphSizeMax
added.description: The maximum in estimated inlined typical graph size.

added.name: UnrollMultiEndLoops
added.description: Unroll loops with multiple loop ends.

added.name: UnrollMultiExitLoops
added.description: Unroll loops with multiple loop exits.

added.name: UseCompressedReferenceShift
added.description: Use bit-shifting to enlarge the address range with narrow references.

added.name: UseCompressedReferences
added.description: Use compressed references (32-bit instead of 64-bit references to Java objects).

added.name: UseDynamicNumberOfGCThreads
added.description:
Dynamically choose the number of threads up to a maximum of ParallelGCThreads parallel collectors will use for garbage 
collection work.

added.name: UseG1GC
added.description: Determines if the G1 garbage collector should be used.

added.name: UseGraphCache
added.description: Turn on graph caching.

added.name: UseInlinedPythonHelper
added.description: Embed python helper in binary.

added.name: UseMonitorFastPath
added.description: Use thin locking fast path in snippets.

added.name: UsePartialEscapeSelectiveInlining
added.description: Use PartialEscapeSelectiveInliningPhase to give PartialEscape phase more opportunities.

added.name: UsePerfData
added.description: Flag to disable jvmstat instrumentation for performance testing.

added.name: UsePriorityInlining
added.description: Use priority-based inlining.

added.name: UseStringInlining
added.description: Determines if the string inlining optimization should be used.

added.name: UseTLAB
added.description: Use thread-local object allocation.

added.name: UseThinLocking
added.description: Use thin locking to optimize monitor operations.

added.name: UseTypedArguments
added.description: Use typed unboxed arguments for Truffle compilations.

added.name: UseTypedResult
added.description: Use typed unboxed return value for Truffle compilations.

added.name: VTuneAbsoluteFilenames
added.description: Use absolute path for source-filenames in VTune events.

added.name: VTunePath
added.description: Path to VTune installation (usually /opt/intel/vtune_amplifier).

added.name: VectorIntrinsics
added.description: Enable vectorized array copy intrinsics.

added.name: VectorUnroll
added.description: Unroll vectorized loops.

added.name: Vectorization
added.description: Enable vectorization.

added.name: VectorizeAllocation
added.description: Enable vectorized array initialization.

added.name: VectorizeConditional
added.description: Enable vectorization of conditional code.

added.name: VectorizeDeopts
added.description: Enable vectorization of loops with conditional deopts before writes.

added.name: VectorizeFoldShaped
added.description: Enable vectorization of loops implementing a higher-order 'fold' function.

added.name: VectorizeGather
added.description: Enable vectorization of vector gather operations.

added.name: VectorizeLoops
added.description: Enable vectorization of loops.

added.name: VectorizeMapShaped
added.description: Enable vectorization of loops implementing a higher-order 'map' function.

added.name: VectorizeNegativeStride
added.description: Enable vectorization of loops with negative strides.

added.name: VectorizeSIMD
added.description: Enable detection of SIMD patterns.

added.name: VectorizeSafepoints
added.description: Enable vectorization of loops with safepoints.

added.name: VectorizeSequence
added.description: Enable vectorization of sequence values.

added.name: VerificationDumpFile
added.description: Value should point to a file where we dump the output of the verification phase if mismatches were encountered.

added.name: VerifyAfterGC
added.description: Verify memory system after GC.

added.name: VerifyBeforeGC
added.description: Verify memory system before GC.

added.name: VerifyDuplicationOperations
VerifyDuringGC
added.description: Verify memory system during GC (between phases).

added.name: VerifyGCStartAt
added.description: GC invoke count where +VerifyHeap kicks in.

added.name: VerifyPGOProfiles
added.description: Turn on a verification phase to check all probabilities injected in nodes match profiles.

added.name: VerifyRememberedSets
added.description: Verify GC remembered sets.

added.name: VerifyWriteBarrierElimination
added.description: Add code to verify that eliminated barriers weren't needed.

added.name: Virtualize
added.description:
Build the native image for a virtualized environment. The argument is a path to a JSON file that specifies the 
virtualized environment properties.

added.name: YoungPLABSize
added.description: Size of young gen promotion LAB's (in HeapWords).

added.name: ZeroTLAB
added.description: Zero out the newly created TLAB. Default: - (disabled).
